content:
Lean 4 seems to be missing the following instance:

instance [Pure m] : MonadLiftT Id m := ⟨pure⟩

Is there a reason for that?

@Mac The short answer is: we didn't need it to implement Lean.
Right now, we are adding missing features and stuff that is blocking Mathport and Mathlib4.
After we have Mathlib 4 running, we will have time to focus on https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/issues/528
@Leonardo de Moura Ah, makes sense. I will add it in Lake for now because I need it there.
@Mac Fwiw, you don't seem to be using this instance anymore
@Sebastian Ullrich ah, you appear to be right. I know I used to need it for something, but I sadly don't remember what.
